parse: Conjunctive waw | Preposition | third person masculine plural

str2: Shemaiah -- 'Yah hears', the name of a number of Israelites

str2: Tobiah -- 'Yah is my good', three Israelites, also an Ammonite

str2: good is my LORD', a Levite

parse: Conjunctive waw | Preposition | third person masculine plural

str2: Elishama -- 'God has heard', the name of several Israelites
